thread.section_title: Wolcott Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Wolcott Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Piggin01
title: Great location
text: Great little hotel location is perfect for all the attractions NYC has to offer my hotel room view wasn't great to be fair but didn't spend a lot f time in the room only thing I would say was the room was sooo hot and the radiators had no controls and couldn't open the window in the room so asked reception if they could turn it down and all they did was open window in bathroom and leave bathroom door open and tea and coffee only available between 6.30/9.30 so make sure you take a drink back with you but the ladies on reception are very helpful would use again
